content:
All 58 evacuated were provided with food, psychological assistance, a traveler package from the International Rescue Committee International Organization (International Salvation Committee) in Ukraine.

About thisreported March 23Head of Donetsk Regional Military Administration Vadim Filashkin.

This is the first evacuation flight to the Rivne region. The next flight to the Rivne region is scheduled for March 31.

To leave for a safe region and get free accommodation, you need to leave the application by phone 0988903318 or 0662856290, get to the place of collection in your settlement, from where a free transportation to the evacuation train in Pokrovsk will be free of charge.

Asreported the armyinform, in Sumy region, a mother with four children was taken out of shelling.
title: 25 children and 6 people with disabilities were evacuated from Donetsk region to Rivne region
description: This was reported on March 23 by the head of the Donetsk Regional Military Administration Vadim ...
author: Army Inform
